name: EarthKids
0:
”Alexa Open Earth Kids and find me an earth treasure”
”Alexa Start Earth Kids and give me an earth treasure”
”Alexa Launch Earth Kids and tell me an earth treasure”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: earth kids
des:
“Earth kids” is an Alexa skill designed to dispense the knowledge of our beautiful planet Earth to kids who would be the future guardians of Earth. 
This skill helps to educate the kids about our wonderful planet Earth, the past glory, the present misery and the future glory that can be possible if we take the right action in the present time.
It teaches them ways in which they can preserve the earth, undo the damage already done and how to restore the Earth to its former state of glory.
It is a useful skill which makes the kids take responsible actions at their young age to reap benefits in the future. It not only educates them but also encourages them through activities like planting a tree, watering a plant which is drying, caring for animals, adopting pets, reducing, reusing, minimizing waste, maintaining cleanliness, etc. Overall, it helps kids to become “Earth Kids” who are full of passion and zeal to protect and replenish the Earth.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
